Package javax.bluetooth

Bluetooth classes and intefaces required by JSR 82.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DiscoveryListener This interface is defined by the JSR-82 specification Java™ APIs for Bluetooth™ Wireless Technology, Version 1.1.
L2CAPConnection This interface is defined by the JSR-82 specification Java™ APIs for Bluetooth™ Wireless Technology, Version 1.1.
L2CAPConnectionNotifier This interface is defined by the JSR-82 specification Java™ APIs for Bluetooth™ Wireless Technology, Version 1.1.
ServiceRecord This interface is defined by the JSR-82 specification Java™ APIs for Bluetooth™ Wireless Technology, Version 1.1.
 

Class Summary
DataElement This class is defined by the JSR-82 specification Java™ APIs for Bluetooth™ Wireless Technology, Version 1.1.
DeviceClass This class is defined by the JSR-82 specification Java™ APIs for Bluetooth™ Wireless Technology, Version 1.1.
DiscoveryAgent This class is defined by the JSR-82 specification Java™ APIs for Bluetooth™ Wireless Technology, Version 1.1.
LocalDevice This class is defined by the JSR-82 specification Java™ APIs for Bluetooth™ Wireless Technology, Version 1.1.
RemoteDevice This class is defined by the JSR-82 specification Java™ APIs for Bluetooth™ Wireless Technology, Version 1.1.
UUID This class is defined by the JSR-82 specification Java™ APIs for Bluetooth™ Wireless Technology, Version 1.1.
 

Exception Summary
BluetoothConnectionException This class is defined by the JSR-82 specification Java™ APIs for Bluetooth™ Wireless Technology, Version 1.1.
BluetoothStateException This class is defined by the JSR-82 specification Java™ APIs for Bluetooth™ Wireless Technology, Version 1.1.
ServiceRegistrationException This class is defined by the JSR-82 specification Java™ APIs for Bluetooth™ Wireless Technology, Version 1.1.
